Can't be helped!"},{"lineNumber":250099,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次のお前の使徒に頑張ってもらうとすっかー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll have your next apostle do their best!\""},{"lineNumber":250100,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gwahahahahahaha!\""},{"lineNumber":250101,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":250102,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホーネットは何も出来ず、","translatedEnglishLine":"Hornet could do nothing,"},{"lineNumber":250103,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスの悪趣味な趣向に付き合わされ続ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"and kept being forced to endure Cavebris’s tasteless whims."},{"lineNumber":250104,"originalJapaneseLine":"旧魔王城――","translatedEnglishLine":"Old Demon King's Castle—"},{"lineNumber":250105,"originalJapaneseLine":"ホーネット派の魔物達が","translatedEnglishLine":"Monsters loyal to Hornet"},{"lineNumber":250106,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリス派の魔物達に凄惨な拷問を受け、","translatedEnglishLine":"were receiving brutal torture at the hands of monsters loyal to Cavebris,"},{"lineNumber":250107,"originalJapaneseLine":"日夜、悲鳴の止まない城。","translatedEnglishLine":"in a castle where screams never cease day or night."},{"lineNumber":250108,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここに、ケイブリスとカミーラが来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, Cavebris and Camilla had arrived."},{"lineNumber":250109,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えへへ、いいとこでしょ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, it’s a nice place, isn’t it?"},{"lineNumber":250110,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここはね女の子モンスター達を孕ませる","translatedEnglishLine":"This is where we impregnate the girl monsters,"},{"lineNumber":250111,"originalJapaneseLine":"赤ちゃん工場にしてるんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"making it a baby factory.\""},{"lineNumber":250112,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この下の階は男の子モンスター共を","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The floor below is where we torture the boy monsters..."},{"lineNumber":250113,"originalJapaneseLine":"拷問するところになっていて……","translatedEnglishLine":" that's what it’s used for... "},{"lineNumber":250114,"originalJapaneseLine":"あ、カミーラさんも良かったらやる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, Camilla-san, would you like to join in?"},{"lineNumber":250115,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":250116,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスの言葉を無視し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ignoring Cavebris's words,"},{"lineNumber":250117,"originalJapaneseLine":"カミーラは奥へと進む。","translatedEnglishLine":"Camilla proceeded deeper inside."},{"lineNumber":250118,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ま、待ってよ、カミーラさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, w-wait, Camilla-san!\""},{"lineNumber":250119,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":250120,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あはは、ごめんね、ホーネット派の城なんて","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ahaha, sorry, you probably don’t really want to come to Hornet’s castle,"},{"lineNumber":250121,"originalJapaneseLine":"本当は来たくないですよね。","translatedEnglishLine":"I imagine you really don’t want to be here."},{"lineNumber":250122,"originalJapaneseLine":"でもとてもいいものがあるんですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"But there's something really good here.\""},{"lineNumber":250123,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":250124,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケイブリスからのご機嫌取りのプレゼントになど","translatedEnglishLine":"Camilla had absolutely no interest in Cavebris's attempt to placate her with gifts."},{"lineNumber":250125,"originalJapaneseLine":"微塵も興味はない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Not even the slightest."},{"lineNumber":250126,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、今のケイブリスはカミーラよりも強く、","translatedEnglishLine":"However, Cavebris is currently stronger than Camilla,"},{"lineNumber":250127,"originalJapaneseLine":"もし拒めばどうなるか……","translatedEnglishLine":"and if she refused, she knew what would happen..."},{"lineNumber":250128,"originalJapaneseLine":"その顔にはケイブリスに付き合わされる、","translatedEnglishLine":"On her face was the displeasure of having to follow Cavebris,"},{"lineNumber":250129,"originalJapaneseLine":"今の立場に対する不満がにじみ出ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and dissatisfaction with her current position oozed out."},{"lineNumber":250130,"originalJapaneseLine":"特別な部屋――","translatedEnglishLine":"A special room—"},{"lineNumber":250131,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほらほら、これが僕からのプレゼントですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, come on, this is a present from me.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自分のせいで自分の部下が酷い目に遭うとこ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seeing your own subordinates suffer terribly because of you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地獄に落ちても忘れないくらいてめぇの記憶に刻みつけてやるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll carve it so deep into your memory that even if you fall into hell, you won't forget it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それとなぁ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And, you know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前はあの方への生け贄でもあるんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you are also a sacrifice for that person."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの方……カミーラのこと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That person... you mean Camilla...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カミーラさん、お前のこと嫌いだからなぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Camilla-san hates you, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっとプレゼントしたら喜ぶぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She'll surely be happy if I give this to her."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前が生きてる限り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As long as you live,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィとハウゼルも俺の命令をなんでも聞く人形だしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky and Hauser are also puppets who obey all my orders."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間との戦争で無茶苦茶コキ使って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll mercilessly exploit them in the war against humans,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ズタボロになるまで磨り潰してやるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: grinding them down to tatters until they're destroyed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、その間にお前が守ろうとした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And in the meantime, the Little Princess you tried to protect

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リトルプリンセスを捕まえてザクーッと殺す、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will be caught and slaughtered."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぁはははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gwahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どーだ完璧な計画だろう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How's that for a perfect plan!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう終わったんだよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's already over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世の全てが俺様のものだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everything in this world belongs to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの言葉に反論できる筈もなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet could not possibly argue against Cavebris's words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットは無言のまま、かすかに眉を寄せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and remained silent, slightly furrowing her brows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、そこで見てな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, watch there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の部下が自分のせいで死ぬとこを……って」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: See your own subordinate die because of you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　なんだこいつ、もう死んじまったのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What’s this, is he already dead?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ったく、主に似て根性のねぇ奴だぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn, just like his master, no guts at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒のケイコは全身から血を吹き出して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apostle Keiko was spewing blood all over her body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶命していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぁははは！　仕方ねーな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gwahahaha! Can't be helped!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次のお前の使徒に頑張ってもらうとすっかー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll have your next apostle do their best!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gwahahahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットは何も出来ず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet could do nothing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの悪趣味な趣向に付き合わされ続ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and kept being forced to endure Cavebris’s tasteless whims.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旧魔王城――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Old Demon King's Castle—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット派の魔物達が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monsters loyal to Hornet

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス派の魔物達に凄惨な拷問を受け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were receiving brutal torture at the hands of monsters loyal to Cavebris,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日夜、悲鳴の止まない城。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in a castle where screams never cease day or night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに、ケイブリスとカミーラが来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, Cavebris and Camilla had arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへへ、いいとこでしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, it’s a nice place, isn’t it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここはね女の子モンスター達を孕ませる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is where we impregnate the girl monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤ちゃん工場にしてるんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making it a baby factory."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この下の階は男の子モンスター共を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The floor below is where we torture the boy monsters...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拷問するところになっていて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's what it’s used for...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、カミーラさんも良かったらやる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Camilla-san, would you like to join in?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの言葉を無視し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring Cavebris's words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラは奥へと進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Camilla proceeded deeper inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ま、待ってよ、カミーラさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, w-wait, Camilla-san!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは、ごめんね、ホーネット派の城なんて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahaha, sorry, you probably don’t really want to come to Hornet’s castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当は来たくないですよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I imagine you really don’t want to be here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でもとてもいいものがあるんですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But there's something really good here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスからのご機嫌取りのプレゼントになど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Camilla had absolutely no interest in Cavebris's attempt to placate her with gifts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 微塵も興味はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not even the slightest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、今のケイブリスはカミーラよりも強く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Cavebris is currently stronger than Camilla,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし拒めばどうなるか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and if she refused, she knew what would happen...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その顔にはケイブリスに付き合わされる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On her face was the displeasure of having to follow Cavebris,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の立場に対する不満がにじみ出ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and dissatisfaction with her current position oozed out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特別な部屋――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A special room—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほらほら、これが僕からのプレゼントですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, come on, this is a present from me."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

out."},{"lineNumber":250130,"originalJapaneseLine":"特別な部屋――","translatedEnglishLine":"A special room—"},{"lineNumber":250131,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほらほら、これが僕からのプレゼントですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Come on, come on, this is a present from me.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自分のせいで自分の部下が酷い目に遭うとこ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seeing your own subordinates suffer terribly because of you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地獄に落ちても忘れないくらいてめぇの記憶に刻みつけてやるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll carve it so deep into your memory that even if you fall into hell, you won't forget it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それとなぁ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And, you know,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前はあの方への生け贄でもあるんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you are also a sacrifice for that person."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あの方……カミーラのこと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That person... you mean Camilla...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カミーラさん、お前のこと嫌いだからなぁ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Camilla-san hates you, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっとプレゼントしたら喜ぶぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She'll surely be happy if I give this to her."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前が生きてる限り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As long as you live,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィとハウゼルも俺の命令をなんでも聞く人形だしな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky and Hauser are also puppets who obey all my orders."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人間との戦争で無茶苦茶コキ使って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'll mercilessly exploit them in the war against humans,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ズタボロになるまで磨り潰してやるぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: grinding them down to tatters until they're destroyed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そして、その間にお前が守ろうとした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And in the meantime, the Little Princess you tried to protect

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リトルプリンセスを捕まえてザクーッと殺す、と」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: will be caught and slaughtered."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぁはははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gwahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どーだ完璧な計画だろう！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How's that for a perfect plan!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「もう終わったんだよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's already over.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世の全てが俺様のものだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everything in this world belongs to me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの言葉に反論できる筈もなく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet could not possibly argue against Cavebris's words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットは無言のまま、かすかに眉を寄せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and remained silent, slightly furrowing her brows.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さて、そこで見てな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Now, watch there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の部下が自分のせいで死ぬとこを……って」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: See your own subordinate die because of you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あん？　なんだこいつ、もう死んじまったのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? What’s this, is he already dead?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ったく、主に似て根性のねぇ奴だぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn, just like his master, no guts at all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒のケイコは全身から血を吹き出して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apostle Keiko was spewing blood all over her body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶命していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and was dead.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぁははは！　仕方ねーな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gwahahaha! Can't be helped!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次のお前の使徒に頑張ってもらうとすっかー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll have your next apostle do their best!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁはぁ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gwahahahahahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネットは何も出来ず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hornet could do nothing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの悪趣味な趣向に付き合わされ続ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and kept being forced to endure Cavebris’s tasteless whims.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旧魔王城――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Old Demon King's Castle—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ホーネット派の魔物達が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monsters loyal to Hornet

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリス派の魔物達に凄惨な拷問を受け、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were receiving brutal torture at the hands of monsters loyal to Cavebris,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 日夜、悲鳴の止まない城。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: in a castle where screams never cease day or night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここに、ケイブリスとカミーラが来ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, Cavebris and Camilla had arrived.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えへへ、いいとこでしょ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hehe, it’s a nice place, isn’t it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここはね女の子モンスター達を孕ませる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is where we impregnate the girl monsters,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 赤ちゃん工場にしてるんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: making it a baby factory."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この下の階は男の子モンスター共を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The floor below is where we torture the boy monsters...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拷問するところになっていて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that's what it’s used for...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あ、カミーラさんも良かったらやる？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, Camilla-san, would you like to join in?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスの言葉を無視し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ignoring Cavebris's words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カミーラは奥へと進む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Camilla proceeded deeper inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ま、待ってよ、カミーラさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, w-wait, Camilla-san!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あはは、ごめんね、ホーネット派の城なんて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ahaha, sorry, you probably don’t really want to come to Hornet’s castle,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当は来たくないですよね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I imagine you really don’t want to be here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でもとてもいいものがあるんですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But there's something really good here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケイブリスからのご機嫌取りのプレゼントになど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Camilla had absolutely no interest in Cavebris's attempt to placate her with gifts.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 微塵も興味はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not even the slightest.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、今のケイブリスはカミーラよりも強く、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, Cavebris is currently stronger than Camilla,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もし拒めばどうなるか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and if she refused, she knew what would happen...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その顔にはケイブリスに付き合わされる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On her face was the displeasure of having to follow Cavebris,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の立場に対する不満がにじみ出ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and dissatisfaction with her current position oozed out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特別な部屋――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A special room—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほらほら、これが僕からのプレゼントですよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Come on, come on, this is a present from me."
